snippet.title: Infected Ones | Pre-Alpha Trailer
snippet.description:
"No place is safe. No one is immune. No hope left. But we'll hold out, and save everyone we can, whatever it takes."

After a massive zombie break-out took over a large city, the military is running out of options of what to do. Resources are low, people are getting wiped by the second, at this rate, the end will be guaranteed.

You have been tasked with an important mission: Get through the zombie-infested areas while you gather resources, save any survivors left and fuel up your escape vehicle before the military nukes the city.

PRE-ALPHA VERSION IS NOW AVAILABLE TO PLAY ON WINDOWS, MAC, LINUX AND ANDROID:
https://williamjacobproductions.com/infectedones

Infected Ones is a third-person zombie shooter and is in early development, may contain various bugs and/or errors. Everything you see can drastically change in the final version of the game.

_______________________________________________________

Trailer Music:
"Noir Now (trailer music)" by Drakensson (https://freesound.org/people/Drakensson/sounds/509389/)
"Trailer-esque track" by vykroft (https://freesound.org/people/vykroft/sounds/416155/)
